H0.text: 10 kg is the mass of an asteroid that has a speed of 200 m/s and a momentum of 2,000 kg·m/s.

H1.text: 1,800 kg is the mass of an asteroid traveling at 200 m/s with a momentum of 2,000 kg·m/s.

H2.text: 2,200 kg is the mass of an asteroid that moves at 200 m/s and has a momentum of 2,000 kg × m/s.

H3.text: 400,000 kg is the mass of an asteroid moving at 200 m/s that has a momentum of 2,000 kg·m/s.
